column5: Overlooking Lake Conroe, Bright 2-bedroom units, have full kitchens and living areas. Individual features include private patios or balconies, and/or laundry facilities.  Amenities include indoor and outdoor pools, as well as a hot tub and a lake, where the resort offers covered boat slips, fishing and a private boat launch. An activity center has equipment for a range of sports (including archery, basketball, horseshoes and volleyball), and offers movies and free Wi-Fi.
column8: Holiday Inn Vacation Club Piney Shores - 2 BDRM
